text: "Snow Drop" is the fourteenth single by L'Arc-en-Ciel, released on October 7, 1998 it debuted at number 1 on the Oricon chart.L'Arc〜en〜Cielのアルバム売り上げランキング Retrieved May 18, 2011 The single was re-released on August 30, 2006. The song was used as the theme song to the TV drama Hashire Kōmuin!. == Track listing == {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#F9F9F9" !# !Title !Length !Lyrics !Music |- |1 |"Snow Drop" |4:35 |Hyde |Tetsu |- |2 |"A Swell in the Sun" |4:42 |Hyde |Yukihiro |- |3 |"Snow Drop (Hydeless Version)" |4:21 |‐ |Tetsu |} ==References== Category:1998 singles Category:L'Arc-en-Ciel songs Category:Oricon Weekly number-one singles Category:Songs written by Hyde (musician) Category:Songs written by Tetsuya (musician) Category:Japanese television drama theme songs Category:Songs about nuclear war and weapons Category:1998 songs Category:Ki/oon Music singles
title: Snow Drop (L'Arc-en-Ciel song)
